scripts.build: npm run build-clean; npm run build-server; npm run build-client
scripts.build-server: cd server; rm -rf dist; npm run build; cp -pPr dist ../dist; cd ..;
scripts.build-client: cd client; npm run build-prod; cp -pPr dist/client ../dist; cd ..;
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist; rm -rf client/node_modules; rm -rf client/dist; rm -rf server/node_modules rm -rf server/dist
scripts.install: npm run clean; npm run install-server; npm run install-client
